event.name: ladies-movie-night
event.title: Ladies Movie Night
event.description: Watch Bridesmaids on the big screen
event.details1: Enjoy the movie with comfy bean bags and cold drinks in the candlelight
event.details2: Additional wine and snacks are available for purchase at the Tavern. Raffles on sale - $5 per ticket for your chance to win a luxury hamper! All proceeds will be donated to the Breast Cancer Awareness Foundation
